item.title: Different Units of Measurement in Libreoffice
item.author: me.sahilgautam.github.io (Sahil Gautam)
item.description: Why work on this Working on this involves understanding the controlls, specially the spinedit, then finding some way to modify it so that clicking on the units “the last 2 characters of the label in the spinedit entry” shows a dropdown, from which we can select a different unit. I find working on this as a great opportunity to get deeper insights into widget implementations. Tip of the day dialog EasyHack I asked Hossien for mentoring, so that I can some day work on notebookbar, and tabbed UI related implementations, and he suggested I start with How to create a new “Tip-Of-The-Day” dialog.

item.title: What Place has Thought in one's Life
item.author: me.sahilgautam.github.io (Sahil Gautam)
item.description: Introduction As a growing young man, I find various challenges in life most of which make the life itself. For the last few days, I have been trying to work on somethings, but since they are challenging, I find myself avoiding those, and distracting myself into doing some other not so important stuff. I find myself thinking of things in general as work, and thus I am not able to enjoy it to my heart’s content.
